Description. Total length: 6.3–11.5 mm . Width across humeral calli: 0.9–1.6 mm . Body red-brown with or without darker area on elytra. Habitus of types :
Figs 13–16
.

Sternites III–IV of abdomen (
Fig. 75
) not or very weakly depressed, with a very light median groove, laterally carinate. Tergite VII of female with long hair (as on
Fig. 88
). Gonopods IX:
Fig. 77
. Spermatheca:
Fig. 78
.
